name: Saltmarch Flats
role_in_state: Primary saltworks and low-tide transshipment flats
economy_niches: Cured fish, kelp and brine-preserve workshops
Tidal staging and light repair for small craft
Seasonal labor provision for augury crews
culture_adjustments: Seasonal, migrant-heavy population over stable guild cores
Weaker formal guild control; reliance on informal crews and contractors
Marsh-born Coastal Tongues dialect with many nautical idioms
Practical fatalism toward drownings and storm loss
Higher tolerance for smugglers and transient merchants
constraints: scarce fresh water for large settlements
poor load-bearing ground limits large shipyards
ritual magic consumes imported reagents, raising costs
notes: Vital supplier of salt and preserved provisions for State_4 fleets
Hosts small navigational-augury posts tied to tide-ritual timings
Labor peaks align with low-tide harvest windows
